doc.field: - [General Systems Research Inc] said it concluded a 15 mln dlr private placement with the government of Alberta. The provincial government purchased 15 mln dlrs of the company's class A preferred shares. The government of Alberta also converted a 2.5 mln dlr debenture into common shares and converted about 2.5 mln dlrs of shareholders' loans into common shares, the company said. Conversion price for both transactions was 1.75 dlrs per share.
